long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UncovAI introduces an innovative platform for detecting Generative AI text, offering a blend of efficiency and sustainability. Instead of relying on resource-intensive Deep Learning models, we employ a mathematical hypothesis that effectively distinguishes between AI-generated and human-authored texts.
